sentence.Network_en: Your riches are corrupted, and your garments are motheaten.
sentence.Network_cn: 2你们的财物坏了, 衣服也被虫子咬了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: mothdermatitis蛾皮炎motheaten蛀坏了的mothfly蛾蝇毛蠓

entry.def: Moth-eaten clothes look very old and have holes in them.
If you describe something as moth-eaten, you mean that it seems unattractive or useless because it is old or has been used too much.

example.ex: We drove through a somewhat moth-eaten deer park...
example.tran: 我们驾车穿过有些破旧的鹿苑。
这种策略愈来愈显得老套。

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
